articles.title: England look to take final two West Indies wickets
articles.description: Follow live text commentary from day three of the third Test between West Indies and England at National Cricket Stadium, St. George's.
articles.content:
Cast your mind back to Lord's Test in August of last year and you can understand why there might be a bit of fog clouding Joe Root's thinking today.

articles.title: India confirm plans for women's IPL next year

articles.content:
India's cricket board is planning to launch the women's edition of the Indian Premier League Twenty20 tournament next year.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
